sections.heading: suggestion system; award granted; amount
sections.text: Any award granted shall be the greater of one hundred dollars or ten percent of the amount of savings referred to in section 81-1353 but not to exceed the limitations provided for in section 81-1351.SourceLaws 1978, LB 286, § 5;Laws 1993, LB 44, § 16;Laws 200

81-1350.Employee suggestion system; award granted; amount.

Any award granted shall be the greater of one hundred dollars or ten percent of the amount of savings referred to in section 81-1353 but not to exceed the limitations provided for in section 81-1351.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 286, § 5;Laws 1993, LB 44, § 16;Laws 2007, LB5, § 2.
